entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12 with temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 12 with temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
